author: 小浪财讯
title: 双创50ETF增强（588320）跌0.46%，半日成交额22.60万元|双创_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，双创50ETF增强（588320）跌0.46%，报0.869元，成交额22.60万元。双创50ETF增强（588320）重仓股方面， 宁德时代 截止午盘跌1.13%， 中芯国际 跌0.23%， 汇川技术 跌0.05%， 海光信息 跌0.68%， 迈瑞医疗 跌1.30%， 寒武纪 涨0.31%， 阳光电源 跌2.96%， 中际旭创 涨3.03%， 澜起科技 涨1.02%， 中微公司 涨0.63%。
双创50ETF增强（588320）业绩比较基准为同期中证科创创业50指数收益率，管理人为广发基金管理有限公司，基金经理为胡骏，成立（2022-12-28）以来回报为-12.75%，近一个月回报为0.28%。
风险提示：市场有风险，投资需谨慎。本文为AI大模型自动发布，任何在本文出现的信息（包括但不限于个股、评论、预测、图表、指标、理论、任何形式的表述等）均只作为参考，不构成个人投资建议。

author: Federalist Papers
title: Family Makes Devastating Discovery After Lowering GoPro Into a Well
text:
Opinion
Family Makes Devastating Discovery After Lowering GoPro Into a Well
A family in Massachusetts was devastated after finding their missing loved one lying dead at the bottom of a well on his property, and now they have questions.
The story reminds us that life can be a fleeting thing and that we should be sure to keep our attention on our loved ones and be aware of their conditions, mentally and physically.
Keith McKechnie’s family said the last time he was seen was on Sept. 7 at his home in Avon, Massachusetts, about 30 minutes south of Boston,
WBTS-CD reported. They also noted that he had a history of health issues, but was often reluctant to seek care.
Local residents had finally resolved to launch a search party starting on McKechnie’s property to search for the 45-year-old man on Saturday, but before they could organize the effort, the police cordoned off the area. Soon enough, the Avon Fire Department joined the police at the East High Street residence.
“They had the whole street blocked off, and they were up there for four or five hours,” neighbor John Hegarty told the outlet.
Stop the censors, sign up to get today's top stories delivered right to your inbox
Officials later reported that a family member had lowered a GoPro camera into a well on the property and that the device recorded the body of the
missing man.
Family members told officials that McKechnie’s cousin lowered the camera down into the well and then contacted authorities when he thought he saw the man’s body on the recording.
“It just seems kind of strange that he was right there in the backyard the whole time,” Hegarty added. “It doesn’t make sense because that was the first place I would’ve looked if I knew there was a well there.”
Still, the Avon Police Department told residents that they had previously looked in the well and did not find any evidence of the
missing man at the time.
Christine Connolly, one of McKechnie’s cousins, told the station, “The family made several calls, as well as in person, and asked them that the well needed to be looked at.”
No cause of death has been offered so far, and police are investigating.
However, the district attorney’s office did say that there were no obvious signs of trauma to suggest foul play. A toxicology report is still pending.
“Our thoughts are very much with the McKechnie family tonight,” District Attorney Michael Morrissey said in a statement, according to
WCVB-TV. “This is a very sad result.”
But Connolly added that clues do not add up to an accidental death in the case of her
https://www.westernjournal.com/woman-boyfriend-go-missing-case-chilling-parallels-gabby-petitos-disappearance/ cousin.
“We felt something nefarious happened because Keith didn’t have his wallet, cell phone or his glasses. The glasses were found by the well on the ground. We were told that they had determined due to the size of the well and Keith’s build, he wouldn’t fit,” she said, according to WBTS-CD.
The
deceased man’s brother, Aaron, also told the outlet that he warned the police to check the well.
“I told them he was a large size, and if his body was being concealed, the most likely place to find him would be in the well by the side of the garage where he stays,” Aaron claimed he told officers.
Hegarty was saddened by the whole incident.
“I’m just so sad that it happened,” the neighbor said. “I mean he was a nice guy.”
It is, indeed, a sad out come for Mr. McKechnie and his family. Perhaps this story may serve as a warning to all of us to stay close to our loved ones.
This article appeared originally on
The Western Journal.

author: Axel Christiansen Z.
title: Anuncian Pokémon Champions, un juego de combate para Switch y smartphones
text:
En el reciente Pokémon Presents, la compañía lanzó el primera avance de lo que se ve como el siguiente de la serie Pokémon Stadium, con la posibilidad de combatir alrededor del mundo, con diversas plataformas y con tus criaturas atrapadas en Pokémon Go y Pokémon Violeta y Escarlata.
La gracia del mundo de Pokémon es que posee muchas actividades por las cuales quedarse enganchado. Puedes jugarlo porque quieres atraparlos a todos, para criarlos, para encontrar a los más bonitos o, por lo que muchos de verdad llegan a la franquicia, para pelear.
De hecho, durante un tiempo The Pokémon Company lanzó juegos de la franquicia, pensados para consolas, pero que no tenían ningún elemento de historia sino que simplemente ver las peleas.
La saga de Pokémon Stadium en Nintendo 64, por ejemplo, fue la primera vez que pudimos ver a nuestros monstruos de bolsillo luchando en forma 3D, tras lo cual llegó después Pokémon Stadium 2 y más tarde, Pokémon Colosseum. En ellos, podíamos tener combates de Pokémon ya fuese con criaturas que podíamos pedir “prestadas” o bien, obtenerlas de nuestros juegos a través de diferentes accesorios con los cuales se conectaban los cartuchos originales.
Y ahora, durante el Pokémon Presents, la compañía anunció un nuevo juego llamado Pokémon Champions, el cual está centrado nuevamente en los combates y en llevarlos a un entorno tridimensional más rico, más animado y ahora, gracias a internet, con la posibilidad de pelear en todo el mundo.
Desarrollado por The Pokémon Works junto a Game Freak, una de las gracias del título es que estará disponible tanto para consolas de la familia de Nintendo Switch (una forma diplomática de mencionar también a la Switch 2) pero también en dispositivos móviles tanto Android como iOS. Esto permitirá que más jugadores que nunca puedan estar conectados en los combates con estas criaturas.
Pokémon Champions también será compatible con Pokémon HOME, el servicio en la nube para Nintendo Switch y dispositivos móviles, lo que permitirá a los Entrenadores añadir a sus equipos Pokémon de juegos anteriores, además de aquellos que aparecen en Pokémon Champions. La fecha de salida no está confirmada pero si hay un adelanto en forma de un llamativo trailer:

author: DE NARDIN Sandrine
title: Sandrine DE NARDIN - Avis d'obsèques et remerciements du 24/12/2023 - Midi Libre
text: Avis d'obsèques et remerciements de Madame Sandrine DE NARDIN Loupian (34) Première publication le 24 décembre 2023 329 consultations Avis d'obsèques et remerciements Loupian, Mèze. Elian MARTINEZ, son époux ; Adrien, Dorian et Floris, ses enfants ; Anne-Marie DE NARDIN, sa mère ; David DE NARDIN, son frère ; Eric, Lionel, Marlène et Marie MARTINEZ, sa belle-famille ; parents et amis ont la tristesse de vous faire part du décès de Madame Sandrine DE NARDIN épouse MARTINEZ survenu à l'âge de 50 ans. La cérémonie civile aura lieu le jeudi 28 décembre 2023, à 11 heures , au cimetière de Loupian, suivie de l'inhumation. Mme DE NARDIN repose à son domicile situé 143 chemin des Verdiers à Loupian. Un registre sera ouvert pour recevoir vos messages d'amitié. La famille remercie toutes les personnes qui par leur présence ou leurs marques de sympathie s'associeront à sa peine. Pompes Funèbres et Marbrerie AMBROSINI 04.67.43.94.64 www.pfambrosini.fr Hommages et messages à Sandrine DE NARDIN 24 décembre 2023 11:03:40 Elian !je te présente toutes mes condoléances ainsi qu'à tes enfants et famille. Je suis de tout coeur avec toi dans cette terrible épreuve de la vie Courage mon ami
